Docsis Cable Modem - 16Mbps

Overview

Tested on Motorola Surfboard SB5101,SB5100 SVG1202 e Cisco DPC3010

Fix Traffic in Cisco DPC 3010 *30/12/16
Added 5 frequencies for docsis 3.0 * 30/12/16

Author

Édipo R. Avanzo
